Observed at: West Vancouver 11:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches in low lying areas before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
